weather.precipitation: Summer in Antwerp is relatively dry with occasional showers.
weather.what_to_pack: Light clothing, sunscreen, a hat, and an umbrella for unexpected rain.

tourism.crowds: Summer sees a high influx of tourists, especially in July and August.
tourism.costs: Prices tend to be higher during peak tourist season.
tourism.booking_advice: Book accommodations and attractions in advance to secure availability.

highlights.name: Antwerp Summer Festival
highlights.description: A month-long celebration of music, dance, and theater in various city locations.
highlights.tips: Arrive early to secure good viewing spots.

highlights.name: Antwerp Pride
highlights.description: One of Europe's most colorful Pride events with parades and parties.
highlights.tips: Respect local customs and enjoy the inclusive atmosphere.

highlights.name: Antwerp Baroque 2022
highlights.description: A cultural festival celebrating the Baroque heritage of the city.
highlights.tips: Attend guided tours to learn more about the Baroque art and architecture.

highlights.name: Antwerp Fashion Festival
highlights.description: A showcase of local and international fashion designers and brands.
highlights.tips: Shop for unique pieces and attend fashion shows.

highlights.name: Antwerp Photo Festival
highlights.description: Exhibitions and events celebrating photography in various locations.
highlights.tips: Visit different venues to explore diverse photographic styles.

highlights.name: Antwerp Beach
highlights.description: A temporary urban beach along the Scheldt River with bars and activities.
highlights.tips: Relax by the water and enjoy beachside events.

recommended_activities.why_this_season: Enjoy the pleasant weather and scenic views.
recommended_activities.practical_tips: Rent a bike and follow the dedicated cycling paths.

recommended_activities.why_this_season: See the animals in the summer sun and attend feeding sessions.
recommended_activities.practical_tips: Plan your visit early in the day to avoid crowds.

recommended_activities.why_this_season: Bright colors pop against the summer backdrop.
recommended_activities.practical_tips: Join a guided street art tour for hidden gems.

recommended_activities.why_this_season: Enjoy a relaxing boat ride with panoramic city views.
recommended_activities.practical_tips: Book a sunset cruise for stunning evening vistas.

recommended_activities.why_this_season: Indulge in a sweet treat at outdoor cafes and markets.
recommended_activities.practical_tips: Try different toppings like chocolate or fruit.

recommended_activities.why_this_season: Explore the former home of the famous painter Peter Paul Rubens.
recommended_activities.practical_tips: Use audio guides for an immersive experience.

recommended_activities.why_this_season: Discover summer trends in local boutiques and designer stores.
recommended_activities.practical_tips: Look for unique pieces from emerging Belgian designers.

recommended_activities.why_this_season: Enjoy outdoor meals surrounded by blooming flowers and greenery.
recommended_activities.practical_tips: Pack a picnic basket with local delicacies.

not_recommended: Avoid walking long distances during midday when temperatures are at their peak.
Avoid overly crowded tourist hotspots without prior reservations.
Be cautious of pickpockets in crowded areas.
